meanings.definition: The state or quality of being warm.
meanings.sent1: The cozy blankets provided a sense of warmnesses on the chilly night.
meanings.sent2: I love the warmnesses of the sun on my face during a summer day.
meanings.sent3: The warmnesses of the fireplace made the room feel like a toasty hug.
meanings.sent4: Her smile radiated a warmnesses that melted even the coldest hearts.
meanings.sent5: The warmnesses of the freshly baked cookies filled the kitchen with a comforting aroma.

meanings.sent1: After some warm-up exercises, the dancers were ready to perform.
meanings.sent2: The warmnesses of the fire pit helped us thaw after playing in the snow.
meanings.sent3: The team did a group warmnesses before the big game to get their muscles ready.
meanings.sent4: The warmnesses of the hot soup brought instant relief to the shivering hiker.
meanings.sent5: The warmnesses of the electric blanket quickly chased away the winter chill.

meanings.sent1: The hug from her friend filled her with a sense of warmnesses.
meanings.sent2: The warmnesses of nostalgia washed over him as he looked at old photos.
meanings.sent3: The warmnesses of gratitude in her heart made her smile brighter.
meanings.sent4: His words of encouragement wrapped her in a warmnesses that stayed with her all day.
meanings.sent5: The warmnesses of love enveloped them in a comforting embrace.
